verses.verse: I wish that <S%G3785><s%> you would bear <S%G430><s%> with me <S%G3450><s%> in <S%G877><s%> a little <S%G3397><s%> foolishness, <S%G877><s%> but <S%G235><s%> indeed <S%G2532><s%> you do bear <S%G430><s%> with me. <S%G3450><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I am jealous <S%G2206><s%> over you <S%G5209><s%> with a godly <S%G2316><s%> jealousy. <S%G2205><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> I married <S%G718><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> to one <S%G1520><s%> husband, <S%G435><s%> that I might present <S%G3936><s%> you as a pure <S%G53><s%> virgin <S%G3933><s%> to Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I am afraid <S%G5399><s%> that somehow, <S%G3381><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the serpent <S%G3789><s%> deceived <S%G1818><s%> Eve <S%G2096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> craftiness, <S%G3834><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> minds <S%G3540><s%> might be corrupted <S%G5351><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the simplicity <S%G572><s%> that is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> <S%G99999><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> who comes <S%G2064><s%> preaches <S%G2784><s%> another <S%G243><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we did <S%G2784><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> preach, <S%G2784><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> if you receive <S%G2983><s%> a different <S%G2087><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you did not <S%G3756><s%> receive, <S%G2983><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> a different <S%G2087><s%> "good news <S%G2098><s%>", which <S%G3739><s%> you did <S%G1209><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> accept, <S%G1209><s%> you put <S%G430><s%> up with <S%G430><s%> that well enough. <S%G2573><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> I reckon <S%G3049><s%> that I am <S%G5302><s%> not <S%G3367><s%> at all behind <S%G5302><s%> the very <S%G5228><s%> best <S%G3029><s%> apostles. <S%G652><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> though <S%G1499><s%> I am unskilled <S%G2399><s%> in speech, <S%G3056><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> I am not <S%G3756><s%> unskilled in knowledge. <S%G1108><s%> No, <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every way <S%G3956><s%> we have been revealed <S%G5319><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things. <S%G3956><s%>

Or did <S%G2228><s%> I commit <S%G4160><s%> a sin <S%G266><s%> in humbling <S%G5013><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> might be exalted, <S%G5312><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I preached <S%G2097><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s Good News <S%G2098><s%> free of charge? <S%G1432><s%>
I robbed <S%G4813><s%> other <S%G243><s%> assemblies, <S%G1577><s%> taking <S%G2983><s%> wages <S%G3800><s%> from them that I might <S%G4314><s%> serve <S%G1248><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> When I was present <S%G3918><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> was in need, <S%G5302><s%> I wasn't <S%G3756><s%> a burden on <S%G2655><s%> anyone, <S%G3762><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the brothers, <S%G80><s%> when they came <S%G2064><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> supplied <S%G4322><s%> the measure of my <S%G3450><s%> need. <S%G5303><s%> <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> I kept <S%G5083><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> from being burdensome <S%G4><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I will continue to do so. <S%G5083><s%>

As <S%G3754><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me, <S%G1698><s%> no one <S%G3756><s%> will stop <S%G4972><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> from this <S%G3778><s%> boasting <S%G2746><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the regions <S%G2824><s%> of Achaia. <S%G1519><s%>
Why? <S%G5101><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> I don't <S%G3756><s%> love <S%G25><s%> you? <S%G5209><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> knows. <S%G1492><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I do, <S%G2532><s%> that I will do, <S%G4160><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I may cut off <S%G1581><s%> occasion <S%G874><s%> from them <S%G3588><s%> that desire <S%G2309><s%> an occasion, <S%G874><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they boast, <S%G2744><s%> they may be found <S%G2147><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> we. <S%G2249><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> men are false apostles, <S%G5570><s%> deceitful <S%G1386><s%> workers, <S%G2040><s%> masquerading <S%G3345><s%> as <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>'s apostles. <S%G652><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> wonder, <S%G2298><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> even Satan <S%G4567><s%> <S%G846><s%> masquerades <S%G3345><s%> as <S%G1519><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> of light. <S%G5457><s%>

It is no <S%G3756><s%> great thing <S%G3173><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> his <S%G846><s%> servants <S%G1249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> masquerade <S%G3345><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> servants <S%G1249><s%> of righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> their <S%G846><s%> works. <S%G2041><s%>

I say <S%G3004><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> let <S%G1380><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> <S%G1511><s%> foolish. <S%G878><s%> But if <S%G1487><s%> so, <S%G3361><s%> yet <S%G2579><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> foolish, <S%G878><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> <S%G99999><s%> I also may boast <S%G2744><s%> a little. <S%G5100><s%>

That which <S%G3739><s%> I speak, <S%G2980><s%> I don't <S%G3756><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> but <S%G235><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> foolishness, <S%G877><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> confidence <S%G5287><s%> of boasting. <S%G2746><s%>
Seeing that <S%G1893><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> boast <S%G2744><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> I <S%G2504><s%> will also <S%G2504><s%> boast. <S%G2744><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> you bear <S%G430><s%> with the foolish <S%G878><s%> gladly, <S%G2234><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> wise. <S%G5429><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> you bear <S%G430><s%> with a man, <S%G1487><s%> if he <S%G5100><s%> brings <S%G2615><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> into bondage, <S%G2615><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> he <S%G5100><s%> devours <S%G2719><s%> you, <S%G1487><s%> if he <S%G5100><s%> takes <S%G2983><s%> you captive, <S%G1487><s%> if he <S%G5100><s%> exalts himself, <S%G1869><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> he <S%G5100><s%> strikes <S%G1194><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the face. <S%G4383><s%>

I speak <S%G3004><s%> by way <S%G2596><s%> of disparagement, <S%G819><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> though <S%G3754><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> had been weak. <S%G770><s%> Yet <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1722><s%> however <S%G3739><s%> <S%G99999><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> is bold <S%G5111><s%> (I speak <S%G3004><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> foolishness <S%G877><s%>), I <S%G2504><s%> am bold <S%G5111><s%> also. <S%G2504><s%>

Are they <S%G1526><s%> Hebrews? <S%G1445><s%> So <S%G2504><s%> am I. <S%G2504><s%> Are they <S%G1526><s%> Israelites? <S%G2475><s%> So <S%G2504><s%> am I. <S%G2504><s%> Are they <S%G1526><s%> the seed <S%G4690><s%> of Abraham? <S%G11><s%> So <S%G2504><s%> am I. <S%G2504><s%>

Are they <S%G1526><s%> servants <S%G1249><s%> of Christ? <S%G5547><s%> (I speak <S%G2980><s%> as one beside <S%G3912><s%> himself <S%G1473><s%>) I am more <S%G5228><s%> so; <S%G1722><s%> in labors <S%G2873><s%> more abundantly, <S%G5234><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> prisons <S%G5438><s%> more abundantly, <S%G4056><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> stripes <S%G4127><s%> above measure, <S%G4056><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> deaths <S%G2288><s%> often. <S%G4178><s%>
Five times <S%G3999><s%> from <S%G5259><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> I <S%G2983><s%> received forty <S%G5062><s%> stripes minus <S%G3844><s%> one. <S%G1520><s%>

Three <S%G5151><s%> times I was beaten with rods. <S%G4463><s%> Once <S%G530><s%> I was stoned. <S%G3034><s%> Three <S%G5151><s%> times I suffered shipwreck. <S%G3489><s%> I have been <S%G4160><s%> a night and a day <S%G3574><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the deep. <S%G1037><s%>

I have been in travels <S%G3597><s%> often, <S%G4178><s%> perils <S%G2794><s%> of rivers, <S%G4215><s%> perils <S%G2794><s%> of robbers, <S%G3027><s%> perils <S%G2794><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> my countrymen, <S%G1085><s%> perils <S%G2794><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> perils <S%G2794><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> perils <S%G2794><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness, <S%G2047><s%> perils <S%G2794><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> perils <S%G2794><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> false brothers; <S%G5569><s%>

in <S%G1722><s%> labor and <S%G2532><s%> travail, <S%G1722><s%> in watchings <S%G70><s%> often, <S%G4178><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> hunger <S%G3042><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thirst, <S%G1373><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> fastings <S%G3521><s%> often, <S%G4178><s%> and in <S%G1722><s%> cold <S%G5592><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> nakedness. <S%G1132><s%>

Besides <S%G5565><s%> those things that are outside, <S%G3924><s%> there is that which presses <S%G1999><s%> on me <S%G3450><s%> <S%G2596><s%> daily, <S%G2250><s%> anxiety <S%G3308><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> the assemblies. <S%G1577><s%>

Who <S%G5101><s%> is weak, <S%G770><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I am <S%G770><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> weak? <S%G770><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> is caused to stumble, <S%G4624><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> burn with indignation? <S%G4448><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> I must <S%G1163><s%> boast, <S%G2744><s%> I will boast <S%G2744><s%> of the things <S%G3588><s%> that concern my <S%G3450><s%> weakness. <S%G769><s%>

The God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> of the <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> he who is <S%G5607><s%> blessed <S%G2128><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forevermore, <S%G165><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I don't <S%G3756><s%> lie. <S%G5574><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> Damascus <S%G1154><s%> the governor <S%G1481><s%> under King <S%G935><s%> Aretas <S%G702><s%> guarded <S%G5432><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> of the Damascenes <S%G1153><s%> <S%G5432><s%> desiring <S%G2309><s%> to arrest <S%G4084><s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> a window <S%G2376><s%> I was let down <S%G5465><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a basket <S%G4553><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the wall, <S%G5038><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> escaped <S%G1628><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hands. <S%G5495><s%>
